catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 84
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: bound book with blue cover; text interspersed with images including: a couple close to one another inside; a man walking past woman with fan open on verandah; man and woman sitting on verandah, woman handing man an object
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Red and White Tale of Genji (Kōhaku Genji monogatari 紅白源氏物語)
title: Red and White Tale of Genji, vol. 4: Festival of the Cherry Blossoms
